item.title: 'Biggest failure'? Obama aide regrets not securing UFO files disclosure
item.description:
'Biggest failure'? Obama aide regrets not securing UFO files disclosure

Outgoing senior US presidential adviser John Podesta has revealed that the main regret of the past year of his service at the White House was keeping Americans away from learning the truth about UFOs.

item.title: A bird? A plane? Here's what you need to know about the Kasganj UFO sighting - Firstpost
item.description:
A bird? A plane? Here's what you need to know about the Kasganj UFO sighting - Firstpost

On Friday morning, a picture of an unidentified flying object spotted in Uttar Pradesh (UP) was trending on social media. UFO? Sachi? Ya another rumour? :O https://t.co/9OAqUEUM3v pic.twitter.com/4GC0go7RoQ - Shikhar Jiwrajka (@shikharjiwrajka) July 7, 2016 Like our good friend Shikhar Jiwrajka here, it made us wonder - UFO? Sachi?

item.title: Do you believe? Canadian project records increase in UFO sightings
item.description:
Do you believe? Canadian project records increase in UFO sightings

â€ŽIt happens - people see a mysterious object hovering overhead, unfamiliar in origin, lit-up like a casino slot machine. And some of those people know the right person to call - a man in Manitoba whose home office is crammed with 5,000 books, 5,000 magazines and 17,000 files that include witness statements, videos and photographs.

item.title: Do you think this looks like an alien base?
item.description:
Do you think this looks like an alien base?

An alien researcher believes he has found evidence of a 'giant pyramid' beneath the surface of the Pacific Ocean that could be an alien underwater base. Found by Argentine researcher Marcelo Igazusta and detailed on the UFO Sightings Daily blog by Scott Waring, the object is said to measure more than 8.5 miles across its base.

item.title: CIA declassifies Area 51, no mention of UFOs, extraterrestrials
item.description:
CIA declassifies Area 51, no mention of UFOs, extraterrestrials

The US government has admitted to the existence of a top-secret site in the Nevada desert, but the declassification will probably do little to calm 'conspiracy theories' over UFOs and other rumors involving the place. George Washington University's National Security Archive obtained a CIA history of the U-2 spy plane, a high-altitude surveillance aircraft, through a freedom of information request, and released it Thursday.

item.title: Raw: UFO enters Earth atmosphere
item.description:
Raw: UFO enters Earth atmosphere

UFO theories began swirling on YouTube earlier this week after YouTube user Streepcap1 posted a video of the stream on July 9.

item.title: A UFO? Video captures strange object near Ohio military base | Fox News
item.description:
A UFO? Video captures strange object near Ohio military base | Fox News

Is it or isn't it? Video of a strange object in the sky near a military base in Dayton, Ohio, had the internet buzzing Sunday over whether it was a UFO, "Fox & Friends" reported. "It looks like it's moving with the clouds," a woman is heard saying on the video.

item.title: Uhm, Did You See a UFO Over Clinton Township?
item.description:
Uhm, Did You See a UFO Over Clinton Township?

Clinton Township, MI - Did you see a circular-shaped unidentified flying object hovering about 100 feet off the ground earlier this month? A witness in Clinton Township reported a sighting to the Mutual UFO Network, or MUFON, on June 2, and said the UFO was about 100 feet away, according to Open Minds TV.

item.title: American presidents and their weird relationships with UFO conspiracy theories
item.description:
American presidents and their weird relationships with UFO conspiracy theories

Hillary Clinton wants to know what's out there. In March, Clinton - the presumptive nominee for the Democratic nomination for president - went on Jimmy Kimmel Live and said she'll do her best to delve into government files surrounding possible UFO sightings.
